Parameters: ImageDecoder: the object performing the decode, for changing its default settings. This value must never be null.
ImageDecoder.ImageInfo: information about the encoded image. This value must never be null.
ImageDecoder.Source: object that created decoder. This value must never be null.
onHeaderDecoded(android.graphics.ImageDe.Description: Called by @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder_E@ when the header has been decoded and the image size is known.
onHeaderDecoded(android.graphics.ImageDe.FullName: public abstract void onHeaderDecoded (ImageDecoder decoder, ImageDecoder.ImageInfo info, ImageDecoder.Source source)

ClassDesc: Interface for changing the default settings of a decode. Supply an instance to @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder#decodeDrawable_E@ or @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder#decodeBitmap_E@, which will call @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder#OnHeaderDecodedListener#onHeaderDecoded_E@ (in the same thread) once the size is known. The implementation of @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder#OnHeaderDecodedListener#onHeaderDecoded_E@ can then change the decode settings as desired.
